ProjectTitle: Investigating a new molecular link between Wnt signaling and IGF1 in osteoarthritis
InitialFeedbackHistory: 22/06/2022 2. [REDACTED] [REDACTED] may be easier to show your datasets in a table. [REDACTED] you already estimate the volume of your data to see if you have enough storage capacity? 3. [REDACTED] [REDACTED] part of your study is covered by S56271? P159/2016 is probably expired, ethical approval for animal studies are normally valid for a maximum of 5 years, please update your DMP with valid ethical approvals and submit as intermediate. 4. A metadatastandard collection that may be useful for your work is the MIBBI https://fairsharing.org/3518, for reporting of animal experiments please take a look at the ARRIVE guidelines https://arriveguidelines.org/. 6. [REDACTED] please note that the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy recommends 10 years of data preservation (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy) 7. [REDACTED] [REDACTED] can also consider using KU [REDACTED] RDR for data sharing: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr.
